html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-07072017-06-09,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActWild Animal and Plant Protection and Regulation of International and Interprovincial Trade Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wild Animal and Plant Trade Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILD ANIMAL AND PLANT TRADE REGULATIONS in order to (1) contribute to international efforts in the conservation of species at risk; (2) meet Canada’s international obligations under the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species and statutory requirements under subsection 21(2) of the Wild Animal and Plant Protection and Regulation of International and Interprovincial Trade Act; and (3) ensure harmonized regulatory requirements with trading partners which are also Parties to the Convention (e.g., the United States and the European Union).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0123 Publication Date: 2017-06-28
AttachmentsAttachment
